product.title: Croc, Master Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5"
product.description: Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types For Professional & Home Use Add a powerful styling tool to your hairdressing kit - the Masters Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5" from CROC®. This reliable Flat Iron hair straightener helps you achieve flawless, long-lasting styles quickly and easily! Master Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5" Hair Straightener Features:‌ PATENTED INFRARED TECHNOLOGY - Infrared Seals cuticles and locks in moisture, adds 30% more shine and creates 35% longer lasting looks. Additionally, it detoxifies and sanitizes hair while reducing heat damage with each pass. ‌BLACK TITANIUM PLATES - Offers Anti-stick, Anti-Static, Anti-Damage smooth one-pass glide for ALL HAIR TYPES ‌Produces negative ions, sealing cuticles, increasing shine. ‌The ventilation system releases excess high heat, preventing internal and physical damage. ‌Built-in ceramic heaters enable instant heat recovery, providing consistent heat during use. Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°] ‌ Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V] Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌ Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌ Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable. Made in Korea 5 Year Limited Warranty How to Use: Remove the plastic screen protector. Press the power button to turn on the flat iron. To activate the infrared, press the power button once more. When you do this, you should see the blue ring turn red, which signals that the infrared is now active. Press the + (higher) or – (lower) button to select the desired temperature. To ensure your flat iron is turned off, please press and hold the power button for approximately two seconds. Pre-caution: Doing any of the following may cause damage to the flat iron. I. Do not wrap the cord around the flat iron. II. Do not unplug while in use, always use the power button to turn off. III. Keep unplugged while not in use.
product.description_html:
Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types

For Professional & Home Use
Add a powerful styling tool to your hairdressing kit - the Masters Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5" from CROC®. This reliable Flat Iron hair straightener helps you achieve flawless, long-lasting styles quickly and easily!

Master Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5"

Hair Straightener Features:‌

PATENTED INFRARED TECHNOLOGY - Infrared Seals cuticles and locks in moisture, adds 30% more shine and creates 35% longer lasting looks. Additionally, it detoxifies and sanitizes hair while reducing heat damage with each pass.

‌BLACK TITANIUM PLATES - Offers Anti-stick, Anti-Static, Anti-Damage smooth one-pass glide for ALL HAIR TYPES 

‌Produces negative ions, sealing cuticles, increasing shine.

‌The ventilation system releases excess high heat, preventing internal and physical damage.

‌Built-in ceramic heaters enable instant heat recovery, providing consistent heat during use.

Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°] 
‌
Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V] 

Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌

Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌

Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable.
Made in Korea

5 Year Limited Warranty

How to Use:



Remove the plastic screen protector.
Press the power button to turn on the flat iron.
To activate the infrared, press the power button once more. When you do this, you should see the blue ring turn red, which signals that the infrared is now active.
Press the + (higher) or – (lower) button to select the desired temperature.
To ensure your flat iron is turned off, please press and hold the power button for approximately two seconds.

Pre-caution: Doing any of the following may cause damage to the flat iron.
I. Do not wrap the cord around the flat iron.
II. Do not unplug while in use, always use the power button to turn off.
III. Keep unplugged while not in use.
product.description_full:
Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types For Professional & Home Use Add a powerful styling tool to your hairdressing kit - the Masters Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5" from CROC®. This reliable Flat Iron hair straightener helps you achieve flawless, long-lasting styles quickly and easily! Master Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5" Hair Straightener Features:‌ PATENTED INFRARED TECHNOLOGY - Infrared Seals cuticles and locks in moisture, adds 30% more shine and creates 35% longer lasting looks. Additionally, it detoxifies and sanitizes hair while reducing heat damage with each pass. ‌BLACK TITANIUM PLATES - Offers Anti-stick, Anti-Static, Anti-Damage smooth one-pass glide for ALL HAIR TYPES ‌Produces negative ions, sealing cuticles, increasing shine. ‌The ventilation system releases excess high heat, preventing internal and physical damage. ‌Built-in ceramic heaters enable instant heat recovery, providing consistent heat during use. Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°] ‌ Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V] Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌ Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌ Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable. Made in Korea 5 Year Limited Warranty How to Use: Remove the plastic screen protector. Press the power button to turn on the flat iron. To activate the infrared, press the power button once more. When you do this, you should see the blue ring turn red, which signals that the infrared is now active. Press the + (higher) or – (lower) button to select the desired temperature. To ensure your flat iron is turned off, please press and hold the power button for approximately two seconds. Pre-caution: Doing any of the following may cause damage to the flat iron. I. Do not wrap the cord around the flat iron. II. Do not unplug while in use, always use the power button to turn off. III. Keep unplugged while not in use. *   * The Masters infrared Flat Iron, rays help to seal the cuticles and lock in moisture, which results in shinier and longer-lasting nails. In addition to protecting hair from heat damage, it also cleanses and disinfects the hair while you style.
    * Infrared Flat Iron‌ For Hair have SECRET BLACK (PICO TITANIUM) PLATES which Offers Anti-stick, Anti-Static, Anti-Damage smooth one-pass glide for ALL HAIR TYPES
    * ‌ Infrared Hair straightener flat iron produces negative ions, sealing cuticles, increasing shine.
    * The ventilation system of Masters Infrared Flat Iron for hair releases excess high heat, preventing internal and physical damage.
    * Built-in ceramic heaters enable instant heat recovery, providing consistent heat during use.
    * Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°]
    * ‌Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V]
    * Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌
    * Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌
    * Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable.
   
   
 * 
   
 *

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
